授業概要・カリキュラム上の位置づけ: The purpose　of　this　course　is　to　familiarize　students　with　the　TOEIC　exam　and　to　provide　strategies and relevant vocabulary　as　well as ample　practice　to　help　students　achieve　a　good　score　on　the　exam.　　The　TOEIC　exam　is　designed　to　test one's　ability　to　understand　English　as　it　is　used　in　international　business　and　other　professional　situations.  Students who plan to take this course should have at least a high intermediate level of English.
授業方法: This course will be conducted on an on-demand (オンデマンド) online basis. Each week, an assignment package will be uploaded, and students will be required to complete the assignment and submit it online. Students will have ample opportunity to communicate with and get feedback from the instructor through Teams.
到達目標: Students will be taught completely in English and will focus on the Reading Comprehension section of the TOEIC test in this course.
授業計画・課題に対するフィードバック: Class 1	Overview of Reading Comprehension sectionClass 2	Incomplete SentencesClass 3	Incomplete Sentences(continued)Class 4	Incomplete Sentences (continued)Class 5	Text CompletionClass 6	Text Completion (continued)Class 7	Text Completion (continued)Class 8	Reading ComprehensionClass 9	Reading Comprehension (continued)Class 10 Reading Comprehension (continued)Class 11 Reading Comprehension (continued)Class 12 Test PracticeClass 13 Test PracticeClass 14 Test PracticeClass 15 Test Practice
準備学習内容・時間の目安: To prepare for this course, students should visit the official TOEIC website (http://www.ets.org/toeic) and learn more about the test itself. Students should also plan to spend at least 30 minutes after each lesson reviewing the grammar, vocabulary, and strategies introduced in the lesson.
成績評価の方法: Students’ grades are based on the satisfactory completion of the assignments and quiz scores.
